description: Let I_c(n,d) be maximal number of independent sets in d-regular simple connected graphs with n vertices; sequence gives I_c(2n,4).
references: Posting to math-fun(AT)cs.arizona.edu by Torsten Sillke (sillke(AT)lh-systems.de).
author: Computed by Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)HRZ.Uni-Bielefeld.DE).
